_sText:
Remake of the classic zombie mod map zm_tension_tf2_vx


Background:
This is a remake of the classic zombie mod map zm_tension_tf2_vx. This version of the map contains several new features including new lighting, better camping spot for humans and overall gameplay fixes.

Support:
Cubemaps, Camping Spots/Barricade areas, 42 Spawnpoints, Optimization

Files:
ZM AN TENSION REDUX, ZM AN DROPTOP HOLLOWEEN (BSP,NAV,.TXT)

ChangeLog: (Redux)
  • [ADDED] - New lighting Under/Aboveground
  • [ADDED] - More props
  • [ADDED] - Cubemaps
  • [ADDED] - Custom Textures
  • [ADDED] - Fog
  • [ADDED] - Proper Spawn limits
  • [ADJUSTED] - Textures
  • [ADJUSTED] - Cadable areas
  • [ADJUSTED] - Breakable Building (none now)
  • [ADJUSTED] - Campable spots outside of map

    ChangeLog: (Holloween)
  • [ADDED] - New lighting Under/Aboveground
  • [ADDED] - Fog sky/Ground
  • [ADJUSTED] - Textures



    IF YOU ARE RUNNING A RELOAD AMMO SERVER, PLEASE USE THE ALTERNATE DOWNLOAD LINK
